query.statement:
SELECT ARA -- 대지역 , ZZBSU -- 협력사 , ZGUBUN -- 건물용도 , NAM -- 고객명 , POSID -- 원WBS , HNO -- 호기 , HNA -- 호기명 , ZBEPJEO -- 완성검사일 , ZBOSUIN -- 보수인수일 , ZOIPSU -- 입주일 , CASE WHEN SHEAVE BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN SHEAVE ELSE '' END AS SHEAVE -- SHEAVE 출고일 , CASE WHEN ROPE BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN ROPE ELSE '' END AS ROPE -- ROPE 출고일 , CASE WHEN ROLLER BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN ROLLER ELSE '' END AS ROLLER -- ROLLER 출고일 , CASE WHEN CHAIN BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN CHAIN ELSE '' END AS CHAIN -- CHAIN 출고일 , CASE WHEN HANDRAIL BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN HANDRAIL ELSE '' END AS HANDRAIL -- HANDRAIL 출고일 , CASE WHEN WHEEL BETWEEN CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)) AND CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8)) THEN WHEEL ELSE '' END AS WHEEL -- WHEEL 출고일 FROM ( SELECT ZMA.MANDT AS MANDT , Z01.CS101_ARA AS ARA -- 대지역 , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(ZMA2.MANDT, ZMA2.ZZBSU) AS ZZBSU -- 협력사 , ZMA2.ZGUBUN AS ZGUBUN -- 건물용도 , ZMA.KUNNR_NM AS NAM -- 고객명 , ZMA.POSID AS POSID -- 원WBS , Z01.CS101_HNO AS HNO -- 호기 , Z01.CS101_HNA AS HNA -- 호기명 , ZMA2.ZBEPJEO AS ZBEPJEO -- 완성검사일 , ZMA2.ZBOSUIN AS ZBOSUIN -- 보수인수일 , ZMA2.ZOIPSU AS ZOIPSU -- 입주일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '101' THEN VALUE(DATE_101, '') ELSE '' END AS SHEAVE -- SHEAVE 출고일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '102' THEN VALUE(DATE_102, '') ELSE '' END AS ROPE -- ROPE 출고일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '201' THEN VALUE(DATE_201, '') ELSE '' END AS ROLLER -- ROLLER 출고일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '202' THEN VALUE(DATE_202, '') ELSE '' END AS CHAIN -- CHAIN 출고일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '203' THEN VALUE(DATE_203, '') ELSE '' END AS HANDRAIL -- HANDRAIL 출고일 , CASE WHEN CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '' OR CAST(#MAT_CODE# AS VARCHAR(3)) = '204' THEN VALUE(DATE_204, '') ELSE '' END AS WHEEL -- WHEEL 출고일 , SAPHEE.GET_CS_FULLMAINT(ZMA.MANDT, CS101_PJT,CS101_HNO,CAST(#DATE_FM# AS VARCHAR(8)),CAST(#DATE_TO# AS VARCHAR(8))) AS FM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS ZMA LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZMA2 ON ZMA2.MANDT = ZMA.MANDT AND ZMA2.POSID = ZMA.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS Z01 ON Z01.MANDT = ZMA.MANDT -- 보수 인수인계 정보 AND Z01.CS101_PJT || Z01.CS101_HNO = ZMA2.POSID_1 ,SAPHEE.ZMMT078 AS M78 WHERE ZMA.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND ZMA.POSID LIKE #POSID# || '%'
AND Z01.CS101_HNO LIKE 'L%'
AND Z01.CS101_HNO LIKE 'S%'
AND ZMA2.ZZBSU = #CB3#
AND ZMA2.ZZBPM = #CB2#
-- AND ZMA.ZZARA = #CB2# AND ZMA2.ZZBSU IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND B010.VKGRP= #CB2#)
AND ZMA2.ZBOSUIN < #DATE_FM#
AND M78.MANDT = ZMA2.MANDT AND M78.POSID = ZMA2.POSID_1 ) AS A WHERE 1=1 AND FM = 'N'
AND( SHEAVE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# OR ROPE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# OR ROLLER BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# OR CHAIN BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# OR HANDRAIL BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# OR WHEEL BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO#)
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
